creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: one of a pair of bracelets, center of bracelet is round with a flower medallion relief design; relief designs surround the medallion; four circular reliefs left-to-right from medallion on both sides: face, star, shell, face; thick smooth lip of silver runs around all edges, including the ends of the bracelet
object_name: Cuff bracelet, one of a pair
title: Cuff bracelet, one of a pair
